item.title: TMS software updates

item.title: TMS Diagram Studio v2.3 released
item.author: Bruno Fierens
item.description:
We're excited to announce the release of TMS Diagram Studio v2.3 at https://www.tmssoftware.com/go/?diagram. Diagram Studio allows to add diagramming, flowcharting & graphing capabilities to your applications. Diagram Studio offers an open architecture to add your own custom diagram blocks. Diagrams can be saved, previewed & printed.

What's new & improved in v2.3:
- New: Support for C++Builder 2007 added
- New: TatDiagram.ConnectionLineId method allows automatic linkpoint linking
- New: TatDiagram.PageLines property allows to make page lines visible
- New: TatDiagram.AutoPage property allows automatic redimension of diagram area
- New: TLiveDiagram save/load state mechanism. The state of the chart being executed can be saved and retrieved later.
- New: TLiveDiagram execution paths concept
- New: TDiagramControl.MakeVisible method, TatDiagram.MakeControlVisible method - New: PageUp/PageDown key support for scrolling the diagram area.
- New: TDiagramToolbar.ButtonSize property
- New: dbLines in TDiagramToolbarButtons allows to make the diagram toolbar to show only lines
- New: TDiagramToolbar.Mode property (tmObjects, tmConnections).
- New: public methods TDiagramControl.HasDefaultTextCell and TDiagramControl.DefaultTextCell.
- New: TLiveDiagram.OnExecuteEx event.
- New: TLiveDiagram: TDiagramState type dsView shows the current state of live diagram chart
- New: TLiveDiagram.MakeActiveNodeVisible shows the current node being executed in diagram
- New: TLiveDiagram.ViewStateMode property specifies if the start, end or current executed node (block) will be highlighted
- New: live diagram fork block demo
+ Several more new features & improvements

A fully functional trial version for Delphi 5,6,7,2005,2006,2007 & C++Builder 5,6,2006,2007 is available now at https://www.tmssoftware.com/go/?diagram

Active registered users can obtain the update free after login on our website.

item.title: TMS TAdvTrackBar v2.0 released
item.author: Bruno Fierens
item.description:
We're excited to inform about the release of a new component TAdvTrackBar. In response to many requests from users, this is an extensive configurable trackbar component with built-in compatible styles for Office 2003 / Office 2007 color schemes and lots more configuration capabilities to create all kinds of trackbars for multimedia, instrumentation, graphics and many other types of applications.

Screenshot:
https://www.tmssoftware.com/images/advtrackbar.png

Features:
- Office 2003, 2007 style trackbar
- Includes optional + / - buttons
- Extensive control over appearance
- Gallery with various predefined trackbar styles including capability to add custom style to the gallery
- Fully configurable background, slider, thumb, buttons with extensive color config or customization with images
- Standard or custom drawn tickmarks with support for image tickmarks, rotated text tickmarks etc..
- Configurable slider with appearance for completed / uncompleted part
- Slider is configurable as rating control
- Track hints
- Compatible with TAdvFormStyler

A fully functional trial version for TAdvTrackBar v1.0 for Delphi 5,6,7,2005,2006,2007 & C++Builder 5,6,2006,2007 can be obtained from https://www.tmssoftware.com/go/?advtrackbar

The new TAdvTrackBar will also be integrated in the next free full distribution update of the TMS Component Pack (https://www.tmssoftware.com/go/?tmspack) for active registered users.

item.title: TMS TWebUpdate v2.0 released
item.author: Bruno Fierens
item.description:
We're happy to inform that TMS TWebUpdate v2.0 was released. With TMS TWebUpdate, you can easily add application executable and/or application data automatic updates via internet or network file transfer to your applications. TMS TWebUpdate offers extensive configuration capabilities to suit your specific needs.

What's new & improved in v2.0:

- New : Delphi 2007 & C++Builder 2007 support added
- New : Support for Windows Vista / UAC added
- New : {doc} prefix
- New : support for Hungarian, Czech, Swedish & Polish language added
- New : parameter InitPath added to DoUpdate method to automatically initialize current directory to app EXE
- Improved : logging
- Various smaller improvements & fixes

Fully functional trial downloads for Delphi 5,6,7,2005,2006,2007 & C++Builder 5,6,2006,2007 are available at : https://www.tmssoftware.com/go/?wupdate

item.title: TMS ASP.NET WebPlanner v2.6 released
item.author: Bruno Fierens
item.description:
We're very excited to inform about the release of an extensive update to the TMS ASP.NET WebPlanner. The TMS ASP.NET WebPlanner is a feature-rich first-class
ASP.NET 1.1, 2.0, ASP.NET Ajax compatible component for implementing a broad range of web based planning & scheduling solutions. Whether a project requires the creation of a single-user Personal Information Management (PIM) application or time planning for multiple resources such as hotel rooms, rental cars, and university courses, the WebPlanner provides an open, highly-configurable interface that will suit the project's needs.

Screenshot:
https://www.tmssoftware.com/images/webplanner1.png

What's new & improved in v2.6:

- New: automatic built-in user rights management system via PlannerEvent owner ID, PositionStyle owner ID and user ID / user administrator setting
- New: Methods CreateImageLinkRef, CreateImageHyperlink in PlannerEvent class
- New: Client side events SideBarClick, HeaderClick added
- New: Server side event SideBarClick added
- New: OverlapSpacerWidth property added
- New: PlannerEvent.Caption.Hint property added
- New: CaptionHintStyle Hint type added
- New: EventKey parameter added for client event parameters
- Updated documentation
- Misc: various smaller code improvements & fixes

TMS ASP.NET WebPlanner v2.6 is available for Delphi 2005,2006 & Visual Studio .NET 2003,2005. Fully functional trial versions can be downloaded from https://www.tmssoftware.com/go/?webplanner. Active registered users can obtain the update free after login on our website.
